extendedInfo.description: Setup your favorite natural scenes to your phone!Road on Desert Live Wallpaper is an animated wallpaper app about one of the best place in the world. Designed for people who like this tourist place! A great app collecting best and coolest Road On Desert Wallpapers! Enjoy this fantastic Road On Desert Live Wallpaper on your android device with lots of different backgrounds.If you are Road On Desert lover, you must not miss this!Parallaxing the Road On Desert with different dayâs scenes.You can personalize your wallpaper by different settings:- Choose sky background among different images- Choose front image among different images- Change sky background scrolling speed-Auto change images based on the time of dayEnjoy!To use:HOME/MENU/Wallpaper/Live Wallpapers/Road On Desert Live WallpaperTo attempt to keep this app 100% free we have included a monetization platform.In using this app, you may see:- Notification messages including offers- Icons on your home screenTags:Road, On, Desert, live, wallpaper, natural, free, divine, lwp, divinelwp, Parallax, most, travelling, place
